name: TabTale
overview: TabTale provides a multi-platform environment for rapid creation of high-quality interactive content for smart devices. Composed intuitively on tablets using TabTale’s composer and created as an interactive publishing meta-format, consumed using TabTale’s viewer for interactive content on any smart device. we understand children’s imaginary world and provide the building blocks for fast creation of smart and rich content of any type such as plays ,interactive books, role-plays and more. our building blocks are designed in advance to facilitate many content attributes such as static or dynamic , set or flexible , age, location, language. These building blocks are designed to extend and communicate with physical objects such as smart toys which can be part of the rich content narrative. Tabtale’s platform is proven to significantly reduce time to market and costs of interactive content production for smart devices. “Compose once - publish everywhere, on everything and for everyone!” becomes a reality with our technology. Allowing creative driven organizations to best capitalize on their existing and new assets in todayâ€™s ever growing, ever changing technological content space. Designed to scale wide as more mobile platforms emerge and scale up with a growing interactive feature set, Tabtaleâ€™s platform is a great creative driven environment for content owners
